path.title: Path
path.x-description: Provide the Apolo Storage path starting with `storage:` to locate your files.

ApoloFilesPath.title: ApoloFilesPath
ApoloFilesPath.x-description: Specify the path within the Apolo Files application to read from or write to.

token_name.title: Token Name
token_name.x-description: The name of the Hugging Face token.

token.x-description: The Hugging Face API token used to access models.

HuggingFaceToken.title: HuggingFaceToken
HuggingFaceToken.x-description: Provide a Hugging Face API token linked to an account with access to the model specified above. This token will be used to download model files from the Hugging Face Hub, including gated or private repositories where applicable.

description: Input configuration for HuggingFace Proxy deployment.

files_path.x-description: The path to the Apolo Files directory where Hugging Face artifacts are cached.

title: HfProxyInputs
